data.eml:eml: Acanthotomicus suncei, a new sweetgum tree pest in China (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae: Ipini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gao, Lei, Cognato, Anthony I. (2018): Acanthotomicus suncei, a new sweetgum tree pest in China (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae: Ipini). Zootaxa 4471 (3): 595-599, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.3.12
